name: Reincarnation of the Fist King
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Dan Woosung, a man who once roamed the murim relying solely on his fists, met his sudden end at the hands of the demonic faction.He then finds himself in the body of the eldest son of an affluent merchant group named Eunha.&quotI don&#039t seek freedom from debts or grudges. Debts must be repaid. Grudges must be settled.&quotThough his new body offered only wealth, Dan Woosung rises again, backed with vast riches and the martial prowess of his previous life.Now, he returns to the path of vengean
